import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import './MyPage.css'; import Card from '../../types/Card'; function MyPage({ card }) { const [showMyCard, setShowMyCard] = useState([]); const myArt = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('card')); // setShowMyCard(myArt); return (


Welcome to Your Favorites!

{' '} Here you can compile your own Art Collection!

{showMyCard.map((card) => (
{card.artist}

{card.title}
{card.bio}

{card.notes}

Link to the Metropolitan Museum site Link to the Wikipedia page

))}
); } export default MyPage;
